title: Tree
shape: A tree with branches and roots
text:
GROW
     STRONG
    REACH HIGH
   BOBBY-san
  LIKE A TREE
   STAND TALL
    ROOTS DEEP
     SKYWARD
      DREAM

title: Raindrop
text:
FALL
   GENTLY
  WASH AWAY
 BOBBY-san'S
  TROUBLES
   CLEANSE
    RENEW

title: Heart
text:
LOVE
 BOBBY-san
  PASSION
   BURNS
    BRIGHT
   FOREVER
  IN OUR
 HEARTS

title: Wave
text:
RISE
    AND FALL
   BOBBY-san'S
  SPIRIT FLOWS
 LIKE THE SEA
  ENDLESS
   STRONG
    FREE

title: Clock
text:
TIME TICKS
BOBBY-san
EVERY MOMENT
A GIFT TO CHERISH
TREASURE NOW
FOREVER PASSES
CLOCK TURNS

title: Mountain
text:
CLIMB
    BOBBY-san
   HIGHER STILL
  THE PEAK AWAITS
 YOUR STRENGTH
  WILL GUIDE
   THE WAY
    UP

title: Butterfly
text:
FLUTTER
 BOBBY-san
  TRANSFORM
   AND SOAR
  BEAUTY IN
   CHANGE
    WINGS

title: Lightning Bolt
text:
ZAP
 BOBBY-san
  ENERGY
   SURGES
  THROUGH YOU
   POWERFUL
    BRIGHT

title: Sun
text:
SHINE
  BOBBY-san
   WARMTH
  RADIATES
 FROM YOUR
  SPIRIT
   LIGHT

title: Footsteps
text:
WALK
 BOBBY-san
  LEAVE YOUR
   MARK ON
  THE WORLD
   STEP BY
    STEP
